Select
	UNIX_TIMESTAMP(startTime) as time,
	Notification, 
	table_name as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN in_no_of_partitions < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) from  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PARTITIONS WHERE  TABLE_SCHEMA='stc_cdr_data' AND TABLE_NAME='rule_engine_auditlog' ORDER BY FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) DESC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,in_no_of_partitions 
,(select CREATE_DATE from `stc_cdr_data`.`rule_engine_auditlog` 
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime 
FROM table_partition_policy WHERE table_name='rule_engine_auditlog' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data1
where data1.Notification=0 and data1.startTime IS Not Null
and $__timeFilter(data1.startTime)

    table_name as TableName,
	UNIX_TIMESTAMP(startTime) as time,
	Notification, 
    in_no_of_partitions
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN in_no_of_partitions < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) from  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PARTITIONS WHERE  TABLE_SCHEMA='$DB_stc_cdr_data' AND TABLE_NAME='rule_engine_auditlog' ORDER BY FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) DESC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,in_no_of_partitions

(SELECT CASE WHEN in_no_of_partitions < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) from  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PARTITIONS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA='$DB_stc_dev' AND  TABLE_NAME='cdr_sms_details' ORDER BY FROM_DAYS(PARTITION_DESCRIPTION) DESC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,in_no_of_partitions 
,(select FINAL_TIME from `$DB_stc_dev`.`cdr_sms_details` 
ORDER BY FINAL_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime

FROM table_partition_policy WHERE table_name='cdr_sms_details' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data5
where data5.Notification=1 and data5.startTime IS Not Null and $__timeFilter(data5.startTime)
